threed_authenticated_response.description: The raw 3DS authentication result from the card issuer.

xid.description: The 3DS transaction ID of the 3DS session

authorisation_mid.description: This is the MID of the acquirer account that you want to authorise the transaction with.

cavv_algorithm.description: The algorithm used to generate the 3DS Cardholder Authentication Verification Value.

eci.description: The Electronic Commerce Indicator returned from the schemes for the 3DS payment session.

cavv.description: The Cardholder Authentication Verification Value for the 3DS authentication session

acquirer_code.description: The name of the acquirer processing the payment request.

threed_offered_response.description: The raw enrollment result from the 3DS directory services of the card schemes.
